text: Came for a birthday party on a Saturday night. Service was excellent, we were a big group and were well taken care of. Appetizers came fast and the food overall was great, ordered the Linguini Primavera with an appetizer of fried calamari!
Delicious.... Authentic Italien, even though I am not, but it feels like it. Wait staff is attentive, and prices are reasonable.
Good place, with great menu and friendly service. the service was A-1 and very welcoming. The dishes were delicious , tasty and generous.
First time here  I am really happy I came  Amazing entr√©es and pizza  Authentic Italian  Defending will be back
